news.title: ChatGPT developing age-verification system to identify under-18 users after teen death
news.summary: OpenAI will restrict how ChatGPT responds to a user it suspects is under 18. System will default to the under-18 experience if there is doubt. Chief executive Sam Altman said ‘minors need significant protection’

news.title: Trump celebrates TikTok deal as Beijing suggests US app would use China’s algorithm
news.summary: Donald Trump claims he has reached a deal with China to keep TikTok operating in the US. Comments from Chinese official in Madrid have raised questions over who could control the algorithm that powers Tik Tok’s video feed.

news.title: Sephora workers on the rise of chaotic child shoppers: ‘She looked 10 years old and her skin was burning’
news.summary: Preteens are parroting influencer speak, stealing and demanding anti-ageing products. Experts say the pressure to fit in is intense – and the beauty stores aren't helping.

news.title: Memes and nihilistic in-jokes: the online world of Charlie Kirk’s alleged killer
news.summary: Tyler Robinson, 22, shot and killed rightwing activist Charlie Kirk. Prosecutors say he texted his roommate to confess what he'd done. While appearing to admit to the murder, he pivoted to mention why he had carved messages into the ammunition.
